title: [SPOILERS] Jon and Dany's age
body:
I haven’t read the books, maybe they’re more specific about it there, in the show they rarely mention character’s ages, one of the few times I remember age being mentioned was when Cersei asked Sansa in one the first episodes. But yeah I don’t think Dany or Jon’s age has been mentioned in the show (maybe it has and I missed it). We know she’s actually his aunt but they’re both probably around 20 something? Anyway, if anyone knows something about it from the books or something I missed from the show lmk. :)



Source: https://ift.tt/2QgPXWH

Anyway, if anyone knows something about it from the books or something I missed from the show lmk. :)

summary: The Dragon in the North Chapter 11
title: The Dragon in the North Chapter 11
description:
As his men died around him, Littlefinger slid Ned’s dagger from its sheath and shoved it up under his chin. His smile was apologetic. “I did warn you not to trust me, you know.”

(A Game of Thrones, Chapter 49, Eddard XIV)

body:
Thought of the day

Don’t you just hate the fact that the Jonerys fandom was dragged into a shipping war through no fault of ours because some people just can’t accept Canon and live in their delusional version of the story? And now other parts of the GOT fandom think we and the Jonsas are all the same idiots who bitch and complain because of a ship when we’re definitely NOT? I’m so pissed!!!! 😡😡😡

title: Seris
body:
[sansa]

freedom

Tired of being beaten and tired of being humiliated, Sansa Stark came to a decision one night while she was lying in bed, wishing to be free from the Lannister’s grip. She had been docile and recited…

title: Wildfire
body:
[throne]

bittersweet goodbye

“For all the pain you have caused my family, you will burn,” Sansa Stark muttered, standing a few feet away from the Iron Throne. The Lannisters had fallen and many of her father’s men wanted her to…

Read more…

summary: Aidan Gillen transforms into Dave Allen for new biopic
title: Aidan Gillen transforms into Dave Allen for new biopic
excerpt: The first images of Aidan Gillen as Irish comedy great Dave Allen have been released ahead of the screening of the biopic Dave Allen at Peace on RTÉ One next month.
